This page contains a 'list of cities and towns in [[Poland]]', preceded by a
table of major Polish cities. The table ranks cities by population based on data
from the Central Statistical Office of Poland. Note that in the Polish system of
administration there is no difference between a city and a town. A
[http://maps.igipz.pan.pl/aims/AIMS.dll?REQUEST=GetPage&PAGE=entry&MAP=indeks
gazetteer] is available to locate any town or settlement on a detailed map.

As of 1 January 2011 there are 908 towns in Poland. For lists of places which
obtained or regained town status in the years since 1900, see [[:pl:Nowe miasta
w Polsce|Nowe miasta w Polsce]] in Polish Wikipedia.
